sense.gloss: to break, to snap, to be cut, to split, to crack
to wear out, to be worn out
to break, to burst, to collapse
to wear off, to stop working, to go dead
to expire (time limit, etc.), to run out, to become due
to run out (of stock, etc.), to be exhausted, to be used up, to be sold out, to be out of
to be broken off (e.g. of a relationship), to break up, to have severed ties, to be cut off, to be disconnected
to cut well, to be sharp
to be sharp-minded, to be keen, to be shrewd, to be quick-witted, to be able
to be short of, to drop under (a certain figure), to beat (e.g. a record time)
to get angry, to snap, to blow one's top, to lose one's temper, to flip
to be able to do completely

sdata.j: ↑堪忍袋↑↓かんにんぶくろ↓の↑緒↑↓いとぐち↓が|↑切↑↓き↓れる|。
sdata.e: My patience has come to the breaking point.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓が↑手↑↓て↓に↑手↑↓て↓を↑取↑↓と↓って↑一致↑↓いっち↓↑団結↑↓だんけつ↓すれば、きっとこの↑不況↑↓ふきょう↓の↑時代↑↓じだい↓も↑乗↑↓の↓り|↑切↑↓き↓れる|だろう。
sdata.e: If we hang tight, I'm sure we can make it through these bad times.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓は↑途|切↑↓とぎ↓れる|ことなく↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓ふりつづいた。
sdata.e: It was raining all day long without intermission.

sdata.j: チーズはナイフでたやすく|↑切↑↓き↓れる|。
sdata.e: Cheese cuts easily with a knife.

sdata.j: そのナイフはよく|↑切↑↓き↓れる|。
sdata.e: The knife has a keen blade.

sdata.j: そのケーキはすぐに↑売↑↓う↓り|↑切↑↓き↓れる|でしょう。
sdata.e: The cakes may be sold out soon.

sdata.j: この↑肉↑↓にく↓は↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓に|↑切↑↓き↓れる|。
このはさみは、よく|↑切↑↓き↓れる|。
このナイフは↑刃↑↓は↓が↑鋭↑↓するど↓く、よく|↑切↑↓き↓れる|。
sdata.e: This knife has a fine edge and cuts well.

sdata.j: このナイフはとてもよく|↑切↑↓き↓れる|。
